rules: Check for security issues and dependency risks
Flag breaking API or contract changes in src/core/contracts.py
Suggest tests for new or modified Python/TypeScript code
Suggest dependency update strategy for security patches and compatibility
Remind to update docs (README, ARCHITECTURE, config) when behavior or config changes
context: Unified-M is a local-first marketing measurement framework (MMM, attribution, experiments). Keep changes backward-compatible and document config/API changes.
